title: 2015 Toyota Yaris
item_description:
Online Bankruptcy Auction of 2015 Toyota Yaris- No Buyer's Premium!

Specifications

  • Year: 2015
  • Make: Toyota
  • Model: Yaris
  • VIN: VNKKTUD33FA047870
  • License: 7MGC734 
    • Registration Expiration:  6/8/2026
  • Odometer Reads: 62,495
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 3330
  • Engine: 1.5l L4
  • Body Style: Hatchback
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 175/65R15

Exterior

  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Color: Black

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once 1. the court order is received and 2. the title has been signed by the bankruptcy trustee. Please allow several weeks after the removal, 3-4 weeks. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.

links.detail: The target is an image representing the item. The content-type specified determines the format of the image returned. image/png, image/jpeg, or image/gif are acceptable content-types.
